meanings.definition: (verb) to utter long, deep, loud cries, as a hound on the scent of game
meanings.sent1: The hound was baying loudly as it chased after the rabbit.
meanings.sent2: The hound's baying could be heard echoing through the forest.
meanings.sent3: The baying of the hound startled the birds in the trees.
meanings.sent4: His baying voice cut through the silence of the night.
meanings.sent5: The baying of the hound filled the air with its haunting sound.

meanings.definition: (noun) the deep howl of a hound or wolf
meanings.sent1: The baying of the wolf sent shivers down my spine.
meanings.sent2: We could hear the distant baying of hounds in the valley.
meanings.sent3: The baying of the hound added an eerie atmosphere to the scene.
meanings.sent4: The baying of the hound carried through the still night air.
meanings.sent5: The baying of the hound echoed off the mountains, creating a haunting melody.
